sn45.7:3.1: 7. Dutiyaaññatarabhikkhusutta
sn45.7:4.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn45.7:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn45.7:5.2: Kissa nu kho etaṃ, bhante, adhivacanaṃ:
sn45.7:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn45.7:6.3: Katamaṃ nu kho, bhante, amataṃ, katamo amatagāmimaggo”ti?
sn45.7:6.6: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo amatagāmimaggo, seyyathidaṃ—
